thread.title: PSPCL Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 1500 Asst Lineman Posts
thread.title_full: PSPCL Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 1500 Asst Lineman Posts

author: freejobalert.com
title: PSPCL Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 1500 Asst Lineman Posts
text: PSPCL Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 1500 Asst Lineman Posts PSPCL Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 1500 Asst Lineman Posts: Punjab State Power Corporation Limited (PSPCL), Patiala has invited applications for the recruitment of 1500 Assistant Lineman vacancies. Eligible candidates can apply online from 10-01-2017 at 10.00 AM to 31-01-2017 at 06.00 PM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below… PSPCL Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 1500 Name of the Posts: Assistant Lineman Educational Qualification: Candidates should have completed two years Apprenticeship in the Trade of Lineman from any other state/ BBMB. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.pspcl.in from 10-01-2017 at 10.00 AM to 31-01-2017 at 06.00 PM. Important Dates: Starting Date for Online Application 10-01-2017 at 10.00 AM Last Date for Online Application of Step -I 31-01-2017 at 06.00 PM Last Date for Fee Deposit at the Bank 04-02-2017 Last Date for Online Application of Step -II 08-02-2017 by 06:00 PM
